titleStmt.title: Two love spells (?), spell to induce insomnia

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License.

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Before finalization, please indent ll. 3–7 (i.e. running 17–21) and 12–14 (i.e. 26–28) in col. ii. col. i  l. 2 should be (space deleted, .9 instead of .9): 2. <:[.?].2[.1]α.1[.1]ω̣. λόγος|ed|.9ρ̣[1.] ὁ λόγος=Preisendanz:>  l. 7: [.?.1]ειν=Preisendanz makes no sense: what he meant was [.1]ειν; also correct πε̣ρ̣.1=Preisendanz --> πε̣ρ̣=Preisendanz  l. 11 replace with final sigma in the first group of letters (plus add spatium?): 11. [.?]<:α̣σασ.vac.1|ed|ισασ̣[.1]=Preisendanz:> --> 11. [.?]<:α̣σας. vac.1|ed|ισασ̣[.1]=Preisendanz:>  l. 12 doesn’t display well either, but the syntax seems correct to me (Preisendanz read ἄκρου but regularized as ἀγροῦ): <:ἄκρου|ed|<:ἀγροῦ|reg|ἄκρου:>=Preisendanz:>  l. 13 εἴα̣σον --> <:εἴα̣σον||ed||ἕψησον=Preisendanz|<:ἔασον|reg|εἴα̣σον:>=Zellmann-Rohrer in Maltomini:>  l. 14 lunate sigma > final sigma in ἀ̣[ν]α̣[τ]ο̣λῆϲ col. ii: change line numbering, i.e. running from col. i: resume from 15  l. 2 (16): ε[.9] --> ε[ca.9]  l. 3 (17): ὄψη[.2][.?]=Preisendanz --> [.7] ὄψῃ[.2]=Preisendanz  l. 4 (18): κρατεραῖςι --> κρατεραῖσι  l. 5 (19): ἤ=Preisendanz --> ἢ=Preisendanz  l. 6 (20): not sure, because the regularization is also accepted by the GEMF editors <:<:ἔνκατα|ed|<:ἔγκατα|alt|ἔνκατα:>=Eitrem:>|ed|ἐν κατα=Preisendanz:> --> <:<:ἔνκατα||ed||<:ἔγκατα|reg|ἔνκατα:>=Eitrem|ἐν κατα=Preisendanz:> OR just: <:<:ἔγκατα|reg|ἔνκατα:>|ed|ἐν κατα=Preisendanz:>  l. 8 (22): doesn’t display properly (only one asterisk at the end – needed also after ἀγρυπητικόν): space needed before vac.2?  l. 9 (23): add space and comma (?): [.4]ἄρῃς=Preisendanz --> [.4] ἄρῃς,=Preisendanz  l.9 λέγε out of brackets  l. 10 (24): add space: ed|λ̣ό̣γ̣ο̣ν̣[.3]λ̣έ̣γ̣ε̣[.3]ηως=Preisendanz --> ed|λ̣ό̣γ̣ο̣ν̣ [.3] λ̣έ̣γ̣ε̣ [.3]ηως=Preisendanz:  l. 10 delete <:μητρόθ̣[εν .?]||ed||μητρόθ̣[εν .?]=Zeller|μητρὸς=Preisendanz:> --> <:μητρόθ̣[εν .?]|ed|μητρὸς=Preisendanz:> (NB: Zeller should be Zellmann-Rohrer apud Maltomini, but irrelevant here because his integration is accepted by GEMF)  l. 11 (25): insert spaces: <:<:(λό(γον)) <#γ̣̄=3#>.1[.?]||alt||(λό(γον)) γ̣ ́[.?]|(λόγ̣(ον))[.1.?]|(λό(γον)) <#ρ̣̄=100#>.1[.?]|(λό(γον)) <#ρ̣̄=100#> γ̣[ραμμάτων.?]:>|ed|λόγο[ν.?]=Preisendanz:>  l. 12 (26): after <:απ̣[.?]: I think it doesn’t make sense to repeat in the apparatus what is already in the text (fort.). Also changed sigma and editor’s name. Thus, change as follows: <:απ̣[.?]|ed|ἀπ̣[ὸ τῆς ἄρτι ὥρας (?)] [.?]=Zellmann-Rohrer:>  l. 13 (27): sigma, accent (next word is enclitic, but Preisendanz has indeed the gravis): π̣υ̣ρ̣ϲ̣ὸ̣ν̣ --> π̣υ̣ρ̣σ̣ό̣ν̣  l. 14 (28): delete space after [.4] and .1ωσ, Preisendanz has traces of 5 letters at the beginning, and at the end (after μ) I would just write [.?] (or does it make any sense to have [.5.?]). Thus, change as follows: <:α[.1].1[.4].1ωσ.2μι̣[.1].1[.1].3[.?]|ed|.5ωσ[.2]μ[.5.?]=Preisendanz:>

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Before finalization, please indent ll. 3–7 (i.e. running 17–21) and 12–14 (i.e. 26–28) in col. ii. col. i  l. 2 should be (space deleted, .9 instead of .9): 2. <:[.?].2[.1]α.1[.1]ω̣. λόγος|ed|.9ρ̣[1.] ὁ λόγος=Preisendanz:>  l. 7: [.?.1]ειν=Preisendanz makes no sense: what he meant was [.1]ειν; also correct πε̣ρ̣.1=Preisendanz --> πε̣ρ̣=Preisendanz  l. 11 replace with final sigma in the first group of letters (plus add spatium?): 11. [.?]<:α̣σασ.vac.1|ed|ισασ̣[.1]=Preisendanz:> --> 11. [.?]<:α̣σας. vac.1|ed|ισασ̣[.1]=Preisendanz:>  l. 12 doesn’t display well either, but the syntax seems correct to me (Preisendanz read ἄκρου but regularized as ἀγροῦ): <:ἄκρου|ed|<:ἀγροῦ|reg|ἄκρου:>=Preisendanz:>  l. 13 εἴα̣σον --> <:εἴα̣σον||ed||ἕψησον=Preisendanz|<:ἔασον|reg|εἴα̣σον:>=Zellmann-Rohrer in Maltomini:>  l. 14 lunate sigma > final sigma in ἀ̣[ν]α̣[τ]ο̣λῆϲ col. ii: change line numbering, i.e. running from col. i: resume from 15  l. 2 (16): ε[.9] --> ε[ca.9]  l. 3 (17): ὄψη[.2][.?]=Preisendanz --> [.7] ὄψῃ[.2]=Preisendanz  l. 4 (18): κρατεραῖςι --> κρατεραῖσι  l. 5 (19): ἤ=Preisendanz --> ἢ=Preisendanz  l. 6 (20): not sure, because the regularization is also accepted by the GEMF editors <:<:ἔνκατα|ed|<:ἔγκατα|alt|ἔνκατα:>=Eitrem:>|ed|ἐν κατα=Preisendanz:> --> <:<:ἔνκατα||ed||<:ἔγκατα|reg|ἔνκατα:>=Eitrem|ἐν κατα=Preisendanz:> OR just: <:<:ἔγκατα|reg|ἔνκατα:>|ed|ἐν κατα=Preisendanz:>  l. 8 (22): doesn’t display properly (only one asterisk at the end – needed also after ἀγρυπητικόν): space needed before vac.2?  l. 9 (23): add space and comma (?): [.4]ἄρῃς=Preisendanz --> [.4] ἄρῃς,=Preisendanz  l.9 λέγε out of brackets  l. 10 (24): add space: ed|λ̣ό̣γ̣ο̣ν̣[.3]λ̣έ̣γ̣ε̣[.3]ηως=Preisendanz --> ed|λ̣ό̣γ̣ο̣ν̣ [.3] λ̣έ̣γ̣ε̣ [.3]ηως=Preisendanz:  l. 10 delete <:μητρόθ̣[εν .?]||ed||μητρόθ̣[εν .?]=Zeller|μητρὸς=Preisendanz:> --> <:μητρόθ̣[εν .?]|ed|μητρὸς=Preisendanz:> (NB: Zeller should be Zellmann-Rohrer apud Maltomini, but irrelevant here because his integration is accepted by GEMF)  l. 11 (25): insert spaces: <:<:(λό(γον)) <#γ̣̄=3#>.1[.?]||alt||(λό(γον)) γ̣ ́[.?]|(λόγ̣(ον))[.1.?]|(λό(γον)) <#ρ̣̄=100#>.1[.?]|(λό(γον)) <#ρ̣̄=100#> γ̣[ραμμάτων.?]:>|ed|λόγο[ν.?]=Preisendanz:>  l. 12 (26): after <:απ̣[.?]: I think it doesn’t make sense to repeat in the apparatus what is already in the text (fort.). Also changed sigma and editor’s name. Thus, change as follows: <:απ̣[.?]|ed|ἀπ̣[ὸ τῆς ἄρτι ὥρας (?)] [.?]=Zellmann-Rohrer:>  l. 13 (27): sigma, accent (next word is enclitic, but Preisendanz has indeed the gravis): π̣υ̣ρ̣ϲ̣ὸ̣ν̣ --> π̣υ̣ρ̣σ̣ό̣ν̣  l. 14 (28): delete space after [.4] and .1ωσ, Preisendanz has traces of 5 letters at the beginning, and at the end (after μ) I would just write [.?] (or does it make any sense to have [.5.?]). Thus, change as follows: <:α[.1].1[.4].1ωσ.2μι̣[.1].1[.1].3[.?]|ed|.5ωσ[.2]μ[.5.?]=Preisendanz:>

bibl.title: The Greek Magical Papyri in Translation, Including the Demotic Spells. Second Edition.

Papyri Graecae Magicae. Die griechischen Zauberpapyri. II. Zweite verbesserte Auflage mit Ergänzungen von Karl Preisendanz und Ernst Heitsch. Durchgesehen und herausgegeben von Albert Henrichs. (Sammlung wissenschaftlicher Kommentare.)
